title: Using my replay files
body:
Hello,
I see how I can use the update client to download and view my replays, but how do I turn an existing replay file into something that can be put on YoutTube/Plays.tv?

replies.body:
You're looking to create a *Highlight*, which you can create while *viewing a replay*. There's a little record button at the bottom part of the UI (navigation of the match) that allows you to record a snippet, or multiple snippets of gameplay that converts to a **.webm** file that can be played by most video players or any *Chromium-based* web browser.

Let me know if you have any questions.
